title: Mobile-Based Remote Language Learning Design: Microlearning Customized for Middle-Aged and Older Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental smartphone usage skills and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Practical content design for improving workplace-relevant language proficiency for working learners, with streamlined learning activities centered on smartphone-based accessibility.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize five core grammar points using 15-minute microlearning content three times weekly in a mobile environment
Learners can complete two weekly mini-projects through video collaboration tools with peer learners
Learners can submit twice-daily language pronunciation practice recordings via smartphone-based voice recording apps and receive peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
